scripts.redev: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ports=5177,5173; foreach($p in $ports){ try { Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $p -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique | ForEach-Object { try { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} } } catch {} }; npm run build; npm run dev"
